column4: Hi guys, can I ask someone for a help with suspend/resume on laptop?
ask away.. dont ask to ask.. not too many people available to ask your problem
i am looking for the problem on the forums
Thanks!
there is not much to find.. but there are some links.. hold on
could this help?  http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?p=1277079
I know - I looked already but couldn't find anything interesting
did you see that link?
Let me look...
yes, that's not related to my issue - I don't see wifi network card after resume
tried to reload all modules related to pcmcia - didn't help
hm.. i found something like that
was it far? ;)
https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/linux-source-2.6.17/+bug/58247 maybe?
i had to go back through my google searches
thanks - let me see...
thats the problem.. i dont know if that solution will work
read through all of those.. and if you make any changes, remember where you made them to fix them later
a lot of reading :) Thanks for pointing!
it looks like the problem.. so you might pick up a bit of little solutions and patch them together
good luck
